dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 92 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 110 Johnson Street in Pickens, South Carolina, as the “Specialist Four Charles Johnson Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 110 Johnson Street in Pickens, South Carolina, as the Specialist Four Charles Johnson Post Office.

section.header: Specialist Four Charles Johnson Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 110 Johnson Street in Pickens, South Carolina, shall be known and designated as the Specialist Four Charles Johnson Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Specialist Four Charles Johnson Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 12, 2022.
